languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} искали на Лилэтан спасения после того, как погиб наш {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g}, наш Крударах. Я прибыла позже, разыскивая следы моих собратьев и пытаясь узнать судьбу моего дома. Собратья мои узрели губительное невежество твоего племени и начали сплетать собственную паутину интриг, в которой и я играла роль — в качестве помощницы Вистенцы Вьятт. А затем — явил{mf|ся|ась} ты".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} искали на Лилэтан спасения после того, как погиб наш {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g}, наш Крударах. Я прибыла позже, разыскивая следы моих собратьев и пытаясь узнать судьбу моего дома. Собратья мои узрели губительное невежество твоего племени и начали сплетать собственную паутину интриг, в которой и я играла роль — в качестве помощницы Вистенцы Вьятт. А затем — явил{mf|ся|ась} ты".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} искали на Лилэтан спасения после того, как погиб наш {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g}, наш Крударах. Я прибыла позже, разыскивая следы моих собратьев и пытаясь узнать судьбу моего дома. Собратья мои узрели губительное невежество твоего племени и начали сплетать собственную паутину интриг, в которой и я играла роль — в качестве помощницы Вистенцы Вьятт. А затем — явил{mf|ся|ась} ты".

traits.locale_text: "The children of Asuryan sought shelter on Lilaethan after the demise of our Craftworld, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for the traces of my kin and hoping to learn he fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and started to weave a web of their own intrigues where I played the role of an assistant to Vistenza Vyatt. And then you showed up."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

traits.locale_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:CraftWorld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}，我们的克鲁达拉赫陨落之后，{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}来到了莉莱赞寻求庇护。而我是后来才到的，我在寻找族人们的踪迹，想要了解我的世界究竟发生了什么事情。我的族人亲眼目睹了你们的族群有多么粗鄙无知，于是他们酝酿起了他们的计划，而我在其中负责扮演维丝坦萨·维亚特助手的角色。在那之后，你就出现了。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

traits.locale_text: “我们的{g|Encyclopedia:CraftWorld}方舟世界{/g}，我们的克鲁达拉赫陨落之后，{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}来到了莉莱赞寻求庇护。而我是后来才到的，我在寻找族人们的踪迹，想要了解我的世界究竟发生了什么事情。我的族人亲眼目睹了你们的族群有多么粗鄙无知，于是他们酝酿起了他们的计划，而我在其中负责扮演维丝坦萨·维亚特助手的角色。在那之后，你就出现了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Children of Asuryan sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our craftworld, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

languages.text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} buscaron refugio en el Lilaethan tras la perdición de nuestro {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g}, nuestro Crudarach. Yo llegué más tarde, en busca de rastros de mi gente y con la esperanza de descubrir qué había sido de mi mundo. Fueron testigos de la ignorancia criminal de tu especie y comenzaron a tejer una red de intrigas en la que adopté el papel de ayudante de Vistenza Vyatt. Y entonces apareciste tú».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

traits.locale_text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} buscaron refugio en el Lilaethan tras la perdición de nuestro {g|Encyclopedia:CraftWorld}mundo astronave{/g}, nuestro Crudarach. Yo llegué más tarde, en busca de rastros de mi gente y con la esperanza de descubrir qué había sido de mi mundo. Fueron testigos de la ignorancia criminal de tu especie y comenzaron a tejer una red de intrigas en la que adopté el papel de ayudante de Vistenza Vyatt. Y entonces apareciste tú».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}は、我々の{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}たるクルダラが滅んだ後、リラエタンに避難した。その後、我は同族の痕跡を探し、自分の惑星の運命を知るためにやってきたのだ。彼らはお前たちの種族の有害な無知を目の当たりにして、自分たちの陰謀の網を紡ぎ始め、我はヴィステンツァ・ビャットの側近の役を演じた。そしてお前が現れた」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}は、我々の{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}たるクルダラが滅んだ後、リラエタンに避難した。その後、我は同族の痕跡を探し、自分の惑星の運命を知るためにやってきたのだ。彼らはお前たちの種族の有害な無知を目の当たりにして、自分たちの陰謀の網を紡ぎ始め、我はヴィステンツァ・ビャットの側近の役を演じた。そしてお前が現れた」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nach dem Niedergang unseres {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiffs{/g}, unseres Crudarach, suchten die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} Zuflucht auf der Welt der Lileath. Ich kam später, auf der Suche nach Spuren meines Volks und in der Hoffnung, etwas über das Schicksal meiner Welt zu erfahren. Sie wurden Zeuge der unheilbringenden Ignoranz Eurer Art und begannen, ein Netz ihrer eigenen Intrigen zu weben, in dem ich die Rolle von Vistenza Vyatts Gehilfin spielte. Und dann seid Ihr erschienen."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

traits.locale_text: "Nach dem Niedergang unseres {g|Encyclopedia:CraftWorld}Weltenschiffs{/g}, unseres Crudarach, suchten die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} Zuflucht auf der Welt der Lileath. Ich kam später, auf der Suche nach Spuren meines Volks und in der Hoffnung, etwas über das Schicksal meiner Welt zu erfahren. Sie wurden Zeuge der unheilbringenden Ignoranz Eurer Art und begannen, ein Netz ihrer eigenen Intrigen zu weben, in dem ich die Rolle von Vistenza Vyatts Gehilfin spielte. Und dann seid Ihr erschienen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} se sont réfugiés sur la lilaethan après avoir fui Crudarach, notre {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g}. Je suis arrivée plus tard, en cherchant la trace de mon peuple et en espérant découvrir ce qui était arrivé à mon monde. Mes semblables, face à l'ignorance calamiteuse de votre espèce, se sont mis à tisser une toile de leurs propres intrigues dans laquelle j'ai joué le rôle de l'aide de Vistenza Vyatt. C'est alors que vous avez fait votre apparition. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

traits.locale_text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} se sont réfugiés sur la lilaethan après avoir fui Crudarach, notre {g|Encyclopedia:CraftWorld}vaisseau-monde{/g}. Je suis arrivée plus tard, en cherchant la trace de mon peuple et en espérant découvrir ce qui était arrivé à mon monde. Mes semblables, face à l'ignorance calamiteuse de votre espèce, se sont mis à tisser une toile de leurs propres intrigues dans laquelle j'ai joué le rôle de l'aide de Vistenza Vyatt. C'est alors que vous avez fait votre apparition. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünyamız{/g} Crudarach'ın çöküşünün ardından Lilaethan'da sığınacak bir yer aradılar. Ben daha sonra vardım. Soydaşlarımın izini sürerek dünyamın akıbetini öğrenmeyi umuyordum. Soydaşlarım, ırkının zehir saçan cehaletine şahit olmuş, benim de Vistenza Vyatt'ın emir eri rolünü üstlendiğim kendi entrika ağlarını örmeye girişmişlerdi. Sonrasında sen çıkageldin."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} sought shelter on the Lilaethan after the demise of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, our Crudarach. I arrived later, looking for traces of my kin and hoping to learn the fate of my world. They witnessed the baneful ignorance of your breed and began to weave a web of their own intrigues in which I played the role of Vistenza Vyatt's aide. And then you appeared."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CraftWorld}gemidünya{/g}mız Crudarach'ın çöküşünün ardından Lilaethan'da sığınacak bir yer aradılar. Ben daha sonra vardım. Soydaşlarımın izini sürerek dünyamın akıbetini öğrenmeyi umuyordum. Soydaşlarım, ırkının zehir saçan cehaletine şahit olmuşlardı ve benim de Vistenza Vyatt'ın emir eri rolünü üstlendiğim kendi entrika ağlarını örmeye girişmişlerdi. Sonrasında sen çıkageldin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
